intervention_catalogue.name: Kaizen: general violence offence
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Kaizen uses a unified approach, focusing on the needs of participants. It is inclusive and effective for a range of responsivity needs, including difficulties with engagement, therapeutic relationships and denial. This strand is for men convicted of a general violence offence.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: Kaizen uses a unified approach, focusing on the needs of participants. It is inclusive and effective for a range of responsivity needs, including difficulties with engagement, therapeutic relationships and denial. This strand is for men convicted of a general violence offence.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: 68 core curriculum sessions with 11 supported learning sessions (one to one or small group)

possible_outcomes: increase psychologicalPositive relationships to address needs relating to a lack of pro-social support/ relationships
Managing life’s problems to address needs relating to impulsivity and low self-control
Healthy Thinking to address needs relating to offence supportive attitudes
Healthy Sex to address needs associated with unhealthy sexual interest
